name: Share The Light
description:
Work with a friend to survive in this procedurally generated experience!

Awesome sound!

Quick notes:

- If you spawn in an undesirable location, don't hesitate to restart the game!

- Press E to open the crafting table!

- Use 1-2 (Player One) and 0-9 (Player Two) to put items in the crafting; use backquote to get them back
